## HeaderContentRenderer interface

Definition of renderer for header for ContentRenderer

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HeaderContentRenderer<TOrdering = any, TMetadata = any> extends GridPlugin 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [metadata](./grid.headercontentrenderer.metadata.md) | <code>TMetadata</code> | Metadata used for rendering |
|  [ordering](./grid.headercontentrenderer.ordering.md) | <code>TOrdering</code> | Current ordering state |
|  [orderingChange](./grid.headercontentrenderer.orderingchange.md) | <code>EventEmitter&lt;void&gt;</code> | Occurs when ordering has changed |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [resetMetadata(force)](./grid.headercontentrenderer.resetmetadata.md) | Resets metadata to defaults |
